Title: Whiplash
Overview: Under the direction of a ruthless instructor, a talented young drummer begins to pursue perfection at any cost, even his humanity.
Tagline: The road to greatness can take you to the edge.
Keywords: jazz, obsession, conservatory, music teacher, new york city, violence, montage, drummer, public humiliation, jazz band, young adult, music school
production_companies: Bold Films, Blumhouse Productions, Right of Way Films
Cast: Miles Teller, J.K. Simmons, Melissa Benoist
